title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, October 11, 2020
description: "Saturday Night Live" premiered on this day in 1975, with George Carlin as host and Andy Kaufman and the Muppets as special guests.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "Saturday Night Live" premiered on this day in 1975, with George Carlin as host and Andy Kaufman and the Muppets as special guests.
